Weapon (shortsword), rare (requires attunement)
The colorful surface of this sleek adamantine shortsword exhibits a perpetually shifting, iridescent sheen. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
The sword has 5 charges and regains 1d4 + 1 charges daily at dawn. While holding it, you can use an action and expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using spell save DC 15: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv]{disguise self} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.6g3WLOZ2u0EbaLAd]{hypnotic pattern} (3 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.X4c8xCkmF8U9HUMz]{mirror image} (2 charges).
